TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DrawingAttributes extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: 指定 的外观

span.span: Specifies the appearance of a

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 "" 属性可指定 的触笔笔尖的设置，如颜色、宽度、透明度和形状。Use the property to specify settings such as color, width, transparency, and the shape of the stylus tip for a . 使用 属性指定添加到 中的笔划的绘制属性。Use the property to specify the drawing attributes for the strokes added to an . 只有在 进行更改后添加的笔划才会显示更新后的属性。Only strokes that are added after the undergo change show the updated attributes. 上已存在的笔画的外观不会改变。The appearance of the strokes that are already on the does not change. 有关 类的实例的初始属性值列表，请参见 构造函数。For a list of initial property values for an instance of the class, see the constructor. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此类通常不在 XAML 中使用。This class is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用两个 对象来模拟在同一 上使用笔和荧光笔。The following example demonstrates how to use two objects to simulate using a pen and a highlighter on the same . 该示例假设 XAML 文件中的根元素是名为 `root`的 。The example assumes the root element in the XAML file is a called `root`. 它还假定存在一个名为 `switchHighlighter` ， 事件连接到本示例中定义的事件处理程序。It also assumes that there is a called `switchHighlighter` and that the event is connected to the event handler defined in this example. summary.span: 将一个自定义属性添加到 对象中。

span.span: Adds a custom property to the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 利用 方法，你可以将自定义属性添加到 对象。The method enables you to add custom properties to a object. 当你呈现自己的笔划并想要提供额外的信息时，这非常有用。This is useful when you render your own strokes and want to provide extra information. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何从 对象添加和检索自定义属性。The following example demonstrates how to add and retrieve a custom property from the object. 该示例添加一个属性，该属性指示 对象是笔还是荧光笔。The example adds a property that indicates whether the object is a pen or a highlighter. `ChangeColors_Click` 事件处理程序中的代码为使用 对象 `inkDA`的 中的笔划呈现一种新颜色。The code in the `ChangeColors_Click` event handler renders a new color for strokes on the that use the object, `inkDA`. 此示例假定存在一个名为 `inkCanvas1`的 ，其中有两个名为 `inkDA`的 对象和 `highlighterDA.`This example assumes that there is an named `inkCanvas1`, and that there are two objects named `inkDA`, and `highlighterDA.` [!code-csharp[DrawingAttributes#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingAttributes/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#5)] [!code-vb[DrawingAttributes#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/DrawingAttributes/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下因素会影响呈现 的高度和宽度，但不会影响 属性的值。The following factors affect the height and width of a when it is rendered, but not the value of the property. - 绘制 时，应用于触笔的压力量。The amount of pressure applied to the stylus when the is drawn. - 属性的值。The value of the property. 如果将 属性设置为0个与设备无关的像素（DIP），则将其更改为2个 DIP。If you set the property to 0 device independent pixels (DIP), it is changed to 2 DIP. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此属性通常不在 XAML 中使用。This property is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example demonstrates how to set the property. 该示例假设你的应用程序有一个名为 `inkCanvas1`的 ，以及两个称为 `inkDA` 和 `highlighterDA`的 对象。The example assumes that your application has an called `inkCanvas1`, and two objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`. 有关完整示例，请参阅 类概述。For the complete example, see the class overview. summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.span: is .

para.span: 当在派生类中重写 时，调用基类的 方法，以确保注册的委托接收事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, call the method for the base class to ensure that registered delegates receive the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 以下因素会影响呈现 的高度和宽度，但不会影响 属性的值。The following factors affect the height and width of a when it is rendered, but not the value of the property. - 绘制 时，应用于触笔的压力量。The amount of pressure applied to the stylus when the is drawn. - 属性的值。The value of the property. 如果将 属性设置为0个与设备无关的像素（DIP），则将其更改为2个 DIP。If you set the property to 0 device independent pixels (DIP), it is changed to 2 DIP. ## XAML 文本用法XAML Text Usage 此属性通常不在 XAML 中使用。This property is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何设置 属性。The following example demonstrates how to set the property. 该示例假设你的应用程序有一个名为 `inkCanvas1`的 ，以及两个称为 `inkDA` 和 `highlighterDA`的 对象。The example assumes that your application has an called `inkCanvas1`, and two objects called `inkDA` and `highlighterDA`. 有关完整示例，请参阅 类概述。For the complete example, see the class overview.
